Module fr.univartois.cril.juniverse
Package fr.univartois.cril.juniverse.config

Interface IUniverseConfigurableSolver

All Superinterfaces:
IUniverseSolver
public interface IUniverseConfigurableSolver extends IUniverseSolver
The IUniverseConfigurableSolver interface defines the contract of a solver that can be configured.
